website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy cardboard cubbies practically build themselves.
pros: Made from corrugated cardboard that is both durable and lightweight
Perfect for storing textbooks, homework assignments, or even shoes
Bold blue color brightens up the classroom
cons: Difficult to read labels on the bottom row

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I ordrered two for my shoes and they were easy and quick to put together. I put all of my shoes in these and it is great to get organized!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these to use for shoes. I was having a hard time trying to find something that will fit all of my daughter's shoes, all of my sandals and my husband's extra wide shoes. Then I came across these and I thought I'd give it a try... I am so happy that I did- they fit everything. I ordered three and that was plenty for all of the pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: Not as wide as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Not wide enough to hold pocket folders and no way you could place oversized textbooks as listed. You have to put folders in at an angle get to work, which takes away space. Really sad since this was for my class and should have been perfectly sized according to the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They will easily make it another year
customer_reviews.text: Used daily in a classroom for a year. They held several folders and two spiral notebooks each. They will easily make it another year! Hopefully three! Update! Going on their third year and holding up. Not as pretty, but still strong enough to hold several folders, a composition book, a spiral notebook, and a fat paperback text book. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Review Queen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teachers.
customer_reviews.text: Great organization tool for an elementary classroom. I bought this to use as a cubby system for my third grade students. Very sturdy. The blue primary color adds vibrancy to the classroom, perfect for helping create positive attitudes and excitement in the classroom. Great purchase for any teacher.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: We’ll see!
customer_reviews.text: This cubby system is okay. I bought one to test out because I’m looking for a small-scale system for student supplies. I was really hoping the slots would fit student folders without bending, but they don’t. They are at least a lot taller than my current mailboxes, so they are less crowded with all the supplies. It is also not very sturdy, but I expected that. The only other cubbies I could find that were close to what I needed had the correct dimensions, but the reviews for sturdiness were terrible, so I did end up purchasing 3 more for my whole class to have a slot. We’ll see!
customer_reviews.author: elle b

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to store small plastic storage bins on a top shelf of a closet. This works perfectly! Assembly was a bit of a challenge as the instructions were simply a diagram. But once I figured it out it was easy to assemble. I put the heaviest bins in the bottom compartments as I’m not sure the others would support heavier items. It is sturdy cardboard, but I think the price was a tad high for what it is. Overall satisfied. I have a photo of not, but there’s no option to add it to the review.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P.

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I bought three and am buying another ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I bought three and am buying another for my husband. I replaced old ones from about thirty years ago. I use them for shoes & it works great. They have other items that cost in the hundreds, & this works even better in the closet. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functunal
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bankers box cubby to use for shoe storage. I needed to replace my old shoe storage box. This was the only one of this type I could find, but it has been perfect! The cardboard is very sturdy and I can store two pairs of flats in one cubby. I bought two cubby boxes and have one stacked on top of the other. They are strong enough to handle the weight. I had my old shoe storage boxes for probably 15 plus years. It looks like these are as well made as my last boxes. I've had them for about two months now and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: beach girl

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for Quality Level
customer_reviews.text: The box is sturdy cardboard, but the price is certainly a bit much for cardboard. When it is assembled, some of the edges of the inserts are brown rather than blue, giving an unfinished appearance. It will do the job for me (place for sewing supplies), but I wish I had bought a sturdier and more finished looking storage unit.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are hard to follow
customer_reviews.text: I am using for shoe storage. It arrived promptly and the color (blue) is nice. I am usually very good at assembling things. It would be helpful if the pieces were numbered and corresponded to the instructions on the box. I am using the box but not the dividers. It fits at the end of my bed and as I stated the color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Shields

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy by design
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a teacher but this cubby setup is perfect for my work. Now everyone in the department has a space of their own for snacks etc. Even though it's made of cardboard it's very sturdy and super simple to put together. Because of the design it's surprisingly sturdy. It looks professional, comes with labels and plastic support fronts for added stability. Just perfect for my needs at a fraction of other products I was considering.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie & Hans

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to use for my house setting classroom. After putting it together I was not happy with it’s appearance and how it buckled in the slots. Followed setup directions but it looks nothing like the picture noted. Maybe it was damaged during delivery, idk but I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Julie Warren

customer_reviews.title: Love this as a closet organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to organize purses, scarves, jeans and shirts over closet shelves (the openings would be too small for shoes). They are extremely light vs. particle board closet organizers (because they are cardboard) and actually fun to assemble (like oragami). There is printing on the long bottom side of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Classroom
customer_reviews.text: These classroom cubbies are great! I am an Art Teacher and they work perfect to store student art work. I've had them for 6 months and they are holding up fine. In fact, they still look brand new and I have over 150 kids filing through my room daily. Last, there is enough room for textbooks, folders etc. I am very pleased with this product and I assure you will be too.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great. I have a small apartment but there was a large space above the shelf in my closet. I used 2 of these for my shoes and other items. Worked Wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Organized shoe storage
customer_reviews.text: I am using these for shoe storage and I love them! I bought two. I was tired of having shoes in boxes that didn’t match and were piled high and would always fall on my head when I went to retrieve shoes! I can easily see every pair. On smaller shoes and sandals I can get two pairs in one compartment. My closet looks so organized and it is easy for me to put my shoes away!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Wish there were more colors.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my office. It was excellent for organizing small items for easy access. Happy with the sturdiness of the cardboard despite being worried the cardboard would be flimsy. And the color isn't as jarring in real life. Would love additional colors for those of us who want to use this in a professional setting.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Had one in my classroom for years!
customer_reviews.text: I brought home my classroom one home when I retired. Now use it to organize my workout pant. Bought this one for overflow shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Chris in Point

customer_reviews.title: Very easy for organizing shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a gazillion pair of shoes with some of them lying on the floor. Putting this up on my closet ledge made my shoe choice much easier than have them all on the floor
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Sundstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing sweaters!
customer_reviews.text: I used cubbies like this when I was a classroom teacher. Now I use them to organize inventory for my ebay store. This size is perfect for storing sweaters. ☺
customer_reviews.author: Jen & Harvey

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and another size from a different company. The cubby from the other company collapsed in no time. So, I got a second one of these. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Trish B.

customer_reviews.title: ... onto model car building table oh man it works great too yes it's cardboard but for $10 it's sturdy ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go onto model car building table oh man it works great too yes it's cardboard but for $10 it's sturdy and does the job for me..
customer_reviews.author: Michael N. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: SPACE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a storage center for shoes in my kids closets. It holds a minimum of 12 shoes and saves space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I put it on the shelf in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for a shoe cubby. It works great. I put it on the shelf in the closet above clothes so I don't have to search for shoes on the bottom of my closet.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Cheap piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful! The directions on how to assemble are very poor! It's made of cheap cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Wanted it for shoes, works well. Each cubby holds a pair and some sandals fit two to a cubby. Easy to assemble, instructions are printed on the cubby.
customer_reviews.author: shoereview

customer_reviews.title: suppose it's what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived bent in half, so a little annoying that way, but easily put together and still works in spite of the slight uneven form. If wanting straight design, buy plastic or wood, not this.
customer_reviews.author: Cultrangel

customer_reviews.title: Needing A Box
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a lot of shoes and handbags. Guess who won out? I purchased these for her use. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: James Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I wish it was a little more cost-effective. But I get great use of it in my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby L Green

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these would be sturdier but they turned out to be quite flimsy. If you plan to use these for LIGHT paper these would work but if you plan on putting any kind of weight beyond two notebooks I do not think these will be worth it. Such a shame because I was really expecting to like them and hoped to be able to use in upcoming school years.
customer_reviews.author: Gordill

customer_reviews.title: Is a great shoe box or closet organizer
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my closet as a shoe organizer. It was hard to find a replacement but this Bankers Box is the perfect size. It is strongly made and I like it much better than hanging shoe bags or flimsy metal racks. Very happy with this buy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoe storage.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for shoe storage. It works perfectly. This is the second one I’ve purchased. The first one is about 20 years old and still in good shape!
customer_reviews.author: lizajane

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of similar items more than 30 years ago to hold my shoes. I still have them and bought this one for my daughter! It is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele L. Pettigrew

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for my dress shoes
customer_reviews.text: Easy access and good fit for my 10.5 men's dress shoes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: This is a great, little tool for my classroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, little tool for my classroom. I use it for extra copies of items and to get things out of piles. It is cardboard but sturdy. Serves a purpose for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great cubby for a classroom
customer_reviews.text: Great cubby for my classroom. The only negative is that the bottom row doesn't have a plastic stabilizer, so it's difficult to see the writing on the labels that are affixed to the cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good for classroom
customer_reviews.text: Strong enough and easy to put together...only issue is there's not space to place labels as shown...they have to be placed on shelves themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of roomy storage
customer_reviews.text: Using these for storing my shoes. Bigger than my old shoe storage bins. Easy and fast to put together, I am very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: MDhousewife

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the office to manage all my extra ...
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the office to manage all my extra papers. For cardboard it is sturdy. It was easy to put together and kind of enjoyable to build. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: nobisfullhouse

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Its cheap, bends with little weight, nothing gorilla glue cant fix
customer_reviews.author: Jose Padin

customer_reviews.title: The box is very easy to be assembled and it works as expected
customer_reviews.text: The box is very easy to be assembled and it works as expected. However, the material looked like some cardboards. I do not suggest to put the heavy stuffs in the upper and middle layer.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Used to store shoes
customer_reviews.text: Use to put shoes in. Kind of wobbly but works.
customer_reviews.author: Hinee

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to put together and relatively sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and relatively sturdy. I am going to use it in my classroom for just adults to access so I am hoping it will last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amy VanGundy

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe cubby ever!
customer_reviews.text: I use for shoe cubbies in top of closet, easy to move lightweight but sturdy. Best option for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: b ward

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to organize gift bags for a client. It turned out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: L Felts

customer_reviews.title: They do the trick for light weight materials but I couldn't recommend them for heavier items
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to organize my yarn collection. They do the trick for light weight materials but I couldn't recommend them for heavier items. The cardboard is not terribly strong.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Handy Organizing at Our Back Door
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for having an organizing space in our laundry/storage area at our back door. Perfect for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Farmasi Joyful Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Great for classroom use!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store worksheets in my classroom. Really sturdy and holds a lot of papers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely put together anything...always enlists my husband’s assistance. Happy to say with this product, I was able to assemble it all by myself...clear instructions, easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Hill

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Used for Postal Carrier in the office at their case.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: They make perfect shoe racks
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. They make perfect shoe racks. They are sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: C. Petiprin

customer_reviews.title: Serving its purpose to store shoes, but I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Serving its purpose to store shoes, but I had difficulty putting it together...couldn' t get the sides to fold flat
customer_reviews.author: Karla M. Paylor

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: You can't put anything too heavy in this product for storage. It is fairly easy to assemble. Just follow directions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and nice for extra organization in my classroom
customer_reviews.text: Good value and nice for extra organization in my classroom. Sturdy as far as cardboard is concerned. Would like to see interchangeable label system with this product so I can add and exchange student’s names etc.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: You should see my closet!
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy organizers. I love them very much for organizing sewing things and more.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed in my classroom. Arrived fast.
customer_reviews.author: T'resa Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Put on shelf in closet. Great way to separate hats/gloves, etc. Easy to put together and is a perfect fit. Very good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Sean A.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled because it's made out of cardboard! It's still sturdy and can hold a lot! I just needed something for shoe organization but this is also good for books! I love it💙 (Ordered 2 and stacked them)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Homeschool organization
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to purchase this at first because I thought it would not be sturdy enough for our books but I was pleasantly surprised. It has several hardcover books and keeps everything neat and organized. I would buy again. Easy to put together too.
customer_reviews.author: V. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Expected something more durable; the item is cheap cardboard and the outside of the cardboard was bent further weakening the product. *, See included picture.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and sturdy. Nice....I put shoes in them and they are perfect for flats or tennies.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Nice n Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It worked out perfectly, I'm going to be buying another one!.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the picture
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems pretty sturdy, but it isn't as aesthetically pleasing as in the picture. The vertical dividers are too big and cause some tearing on tge top and bottom. Mine also has a bug crease along the top that gives it a slight tenting shape. Also, there are also two black plastic reinforcers so labeling the bottom shelf is difficult. It is serving it's purpose so far. I had to bend a few sticker books to fit them in.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Sisson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The box is exactly as described, but the customer service is fnatastic
customer_reviews.author: LifeStyleByTheBook

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it great for organization, I use it for shoes!
customer_reviews.author: KB81

customer_reviews.title: It has held up nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to store small video cameras in my classroom. It has held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jerald Pierucci

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again, oh yeah purchased twice.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it, keeps my shoes orderly & worry free of smashing
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Derby

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter for her classroom. She loves it! Holds all the paper work she needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Maryeileen Wagner

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy, I love it
customer_reviews.text: This contraption has made my desk so much more organized! It's very sturdy, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: JenMcL

customer_reviews.title: I haven't assembled it but I was expecting something a little more sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It basically just cardboard you link together, I haven't assembled it but I was expecting something a little more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie

customer_reviews.title: They fit my needs perfectly. I use them in ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit my needs perfectly. I use them in my classroom as mailboxes to store my students corrected work.
customer_reviews.author: lynne farber

customer_reviews.title: It looks very nice and holds even more than I expected it to
customer_reviews.text: Use it to sort mailing supplies. It looks very nice and holds even more than I expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Werth

customer_reviews.title: Use for closet organizer
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together. I'm using it for a clost organizer to put sweaters and shoes in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Organization is important
customer_reviews.text: I needed the additional shelves to organize and these work perfectly. Easy to assemble and lots of space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs, and very affordable. Easy to put together, too.
customer_reviews.author: M Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: It was very nice. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was very nice. Sturdy, but It did not fit the space I needed it for - I neglected to check the dimnensions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I am using it to hold my shoes. The shoes fit perfectly and it looks so neat and orderly! I LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Its ok, but really unstable if you put more ...
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, but really unstable if you put more than 50 sheets per section. Started folding over when I added binders.
customer_reviews.author: Sanaaz S.

customer_reviews.title: Used in my 6th grade classroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use in my classroom for students to keep their books and papers. They have held up well and I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: stephen suplick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use for shoe storage on a closet shelf .. works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is useful and very practical.
customer_reviews.text: This product is used to collect and store papers for science, social studies, and homework for my three classes.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina McGregor

customer_reviews.title: ... well but a pain to put together due to horrible
customer_reviews.text: Works well but a pain to put together due to horrible directions
customer_reviews.author: S. Karlen

customer_reviews.title: Trash!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this purchase. A waste of my money. Nothing but and cardboard box. I purchased two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Powell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy ... Bigger capacity actually is so helpful for class projects. Love IT
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Good value, useful
customer_reviews.text: It's not quite as nice as it looks in the picture but it's still reasonable quality, considering the price. The openings are big enough to hold 8.5 x 11 paper but just barely (no extra room). The directions for putting it together are a little strange but it's pretty logical to assemble. We only use it to hold paper (no books) and it seems to be holding up well. Overall a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed for the space in my closet. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Clark

customer_reviews.title: Literature sorter for my books
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied! It's missing the front bar which holds shelves in place. It is not sturdy. I'm very disappointed. Not able to use.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis O. Turner Moss

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: This was as sturdy as I expected. The picture shows it holding heavy books, and it can definitely handle that. The only con is the slots are slightly too narrow to fit binders, but otherwise, they are a good size.
customer_reviews.author: JustAGirl83

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! I 've had it for months and its holding up beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Emory Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids shoes. Vibrant color.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a shoe rack. I wanted something colorful for my nephews room for his shoes. This was perfect. I love the vibrant blue. The size was perfect for his shoes, and fit perfectly in his closet. It did bend a little on the top as you can see in the photo but that was more of user error than the product. I would recommend this. Not sure if it fits adult shoes. I bought two and stacked them on each other.
customer_reviews.author: phillygem

product_meta.title: Bankers Box Classroom 9 Compartment Cubby Storage 16"H x 28 1/4"W x 13"D (3380701)
product_meta.description: The Bankers Box 9 Compartment Classroom Cubby provides a central location for storing large text books and tracking student work. Nine roomy compartments hold oversized books and teaching materials. Sturdy multi-layered corrugate construction offers lasting performance. Includes channels for easy labeling and file identification. External unit dimensions: 16"H x 28 1/4"W x 13"D. 60% recycled content.
feature_bullets: Provides a central location for storing large text books and tracking student work
Nine roomy compartments hold oversized books and teaching materials
Sturdy multi-layered corrugate construction offers lasting performance
Includes channels for easy labeling and file identification

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars193 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
